ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.hit points:
First Level: 10 + Constitution Modifier
After First: 1d10 (or 6) + your Constitution modifier per Ranger level
ranger.skill proficiencies:
Choose three from:
Animal Handling Athletics
Insight
Investigation
Nature
Perception
Stealth
Survival
ranger.equipment:
(a) scale mail or (b) leather armor
(a) two shortswords or (b) two simple melee weapons
(a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer's pack
A longbow and a quiver of 20 arrows
ranger.subclasses:
Beast Master Conclave
Fey Wanderer (UA)
Gloom Stalker Conclave
Horizon Walker Conclave
Hunter Conclave
Monster Slayer Conclave
Primeval Guardian Conclave (UA)
Swarmkeeper (UA)
ranger.features:
Favored Enemy
Natural Explorer
Fighting Style
Spellcasting
Primeval Awareness
Ranger Conclave
Greater Favored Enemy
Fleet of Foot
Hide in Plain Sight
Vanish
Feral Senses
Foe Slayer
